name: clerk-airtable-apartment-hunt
description: Official example use case for how you setup Airtable with Clerk.dev to achieve authenticated user access for your data.

CLERK_FRONTEND_API.description: The hostname of Clerk Frontend API used for authentication.

CLERK_API_KEY.description: The secret key for accessing the Clerk Backend API.

AIRTABLE_API_KEY.description: You can retrieve this from https://airtable.com/account.

AIRTABLE_BASE_ID.description: You can retrieve this from https://airtable.com/api after selecting your target base.
